title: Foxworth Friday: Irsay Speaks On It, Simmons Struggles, and is Russ the new Dwight Howard?
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth weigh in on Jim Irsay discussing Dan Snyder (2:21), why a black owner in the NFL would be nothing more than symbolic (13:56), Ben Simmons' struggles in his return to the NBA (38:40), and ask if Russell Wilson is the new Dwight Howard (50:47).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
